refnamediv.refpurpose: Discards all tickets for the issuer

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The kas forgetticket command discards all of the issuer's tickets stored in the local machine's kernel memory. This includes the AFS server ticket from each cell in which the user has authenticated, and any tickets that the user have acquired during the current kas session (either when entering the session or by using the kas getticket command).

listitem.para: Discards all tickets. This argument explicitly invokes the command's default behavior.
Prints the online help for this command. All other valid options are ignored.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: The following command discards all of the issuer's tickets.

refsect1.title: Privilege Required
refsect1.para: None, and no password is required.
